title: Harvard University sign - Trajan?
content:
Is this Trajan?

What are the numbers?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130222063305im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1727cambridge_small_5333.jpg)
author: jojo

comments.content: Certainly not Trajan. Looks like Garamond, but I can't tell exactly which version, probably Adobe's.

It is Adobe Garamond. The uppercase "T" to go along with the "R" are the indicators. Usually when identifying typefaces, I first look at the "R" which more times than not usually has the identifying characteristics of a particular font.
